query: Which company had the highest operating margin in 2023?
answer: Gross margin increased $10.4 billion or 8% driven by growth in Intelligent Cloud and Productivity and Business Processes. Excluding the impact of the change in accounting estimate, gross margin percentage decreased 1 point.
